analysis.key_quote: Replacing qualified career civil servants who serve the people with sycophants who serve only trump would turn Civil Service into Trump Service and harm the nation, possibly irreparably.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of civil service and the potential replacement of qualified individuals with those lacking merit. It emphasizes the importance of maintaining a merit-based system and warns against the detrimental effects of such changes.
